description: A matrix of buttons connected as a keypad

contents.name: rows
contents.description: Number of rows in the matrix

contents.name: columns
contents.description: Number of columns in the matrix

contents.name: down
contents.description: Emitted when a key, at the given index, goes from inactive (`pressed == 0`) to active.

contents.name: up
contents.description: Emitted when a key, at the given index, goes from active (`pressed == 1`) to inactive.

contents.name: click
contents.description: Emitted together with `up` when the press time was not longer than 500ms.

contents.name: long_click
contents.description: Emitted together with `up` when the press time was more than 500ms.
